experience.description: Designing and developing websites for local businesses and startups. Created over 10 custom websites with focus on responsive design, SEO optimization, and performance. Specialized in Django-based solutions for small businesses.
Assisting in natural language processing research focused on Nepali language AI applications. Implementing machine learning models for text classification and sentiment analysis of Nepali text data.
Worked on front-end development for multiple client projects. Implemented responsive designs, optimized website performance, and collaborated with the design team to create user-friendly interfaces.
